dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.sender_name: Studio Peyo (owners of the Smurf brand)
dmca.principal_name: Studio Peyo (owners of the Smurf brand)

works.description:
We own the copyright and trademark of the
 
Smurf brand. This developer is using our Smurf trademark (and copyrighted 

Smurf images and characters) in multiple games without our permission.
